legal.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important warnings
content: This virtual assistant is an artificial intelligence offering general information for educational purposes, based on non-personalized content.
‚ùå DOES NOT REPLACE a medical or nutritional consultation
‚ùå DOES NOT DIAGNOSE
‚ùå DOES NOT PRESCRIBE treatment or nutrition plan
For any health problem:
‚úÖ Consult a qualified healthcare or nutrition professional
‚úÖ Never modify a treatment or care plan without professional advice
‚úÖ In case of emergency, contact emergency services
The information provided is for educational purposes only and does not constitute a professional act.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
content: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy explains what data is collected, how it is used and protected when you use the Dok2u Multi Agent assistant.
1. Data collected
- Provided information: The questions you ask the assistant and the information you enter.
- Technical data: Information about the device, browser, IP address and connection data.
2. Use of data
- Provide and improve the AI assistant service.
- Ensure security and prevent abuse.
- Analyze application usage to improve user experience.
3. Data sharing
Your data is never sold to third parties. It may be shared only in the following cases:
- Compliance with legal obligations.
- Protection against fraud or security threats.
4. Security
We implement security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, modification or disclosure.
5. Your rights
- Access your personal data.
- Request correction or deletion of your data.
- Withdraw your consent at any time.
6. Contact
For any questions regarding this privacy policy, contact us at denis@imxtech.ca.

about.title: About the application
about.content:
Dok2u Multi Agent is an experimental web application using artificial intelligence.

The goal of this tool is to promote public understanding and education, while respecting the boundaries between general information and regulated professional services.

This application is developed by IMX Technologie inc.
